# updatedQueue

**Type Property**

An action that represents a nonspecific change to the queue.

## Declaration

```swift
static let updatedQueue: GroupSessionEvent.Action
```

## Discussion

Use this action when the other action types don’t accurately describe the change you made to the queue. If you can specify the change using a [doc://com.apple.GroupActivities/documentation/GroupActivities/GroupSessionEvent/Action-swift.struct/QueueChange] type, use the [doc://com.apple.GroupActivities/documentation/GroupActivities/GroupSessionEvent/Action-swift.struct/updatedQueue(_:)] method instead.

## Getting change-related actions

- **updatedQueue(_:)**: Returns an action that represents a change to the playback queue.
- **GroupSessionEvent.Action.QueueChange**: A type that describes a modification to the playback queue.
